name: 25 days on a cyberpunk roadtrip
description:
☆ 25 days on a cyberpunk roadtrip ☆

hey, sometimes a family is an overly-clichéd detective protagonist, his robot husband, their eight-year-old cyborg daughter, and their sentient car, and they're also all on the run from the cops!

☆ how to play ☆

  • at the end of each day's diary entry, a word or phrase will be highlighted in green. click on that to bring up the dialogue options following that day's events.
  • an arrow appears in the bottom right box to show when you can move on to the next day by clicking on it.
  • each dialogue option you can choose affects your stats differently - letting any of them hit zero gives you a bad ending!
  • you can look at a map of the road trip by clicking the "map" tab in the top left. clicking on the "diary" tab takes you back to the game!

☆ more of our games! ☆

if you like this game, we also made 25 days on a pirate ship,  it's similar but with a fantasy/d&d setting and story! 

game by: fancy pigeons
